com.sshtools.util
Class IOStreamConnector

java.lang.Object
  com.sshtools.util.IOStreamConnector

public class IOStreamConnector
extends Object

Connects an input stream to an outputstream. Reads from in stream and writes to out stream.

Author:
Lee David Painter
